mapper.select: select pi_seq,pi_name, pi_price, pi_info, pi_discount_rate, pi_point_rate, pi_release_date, pi_stock, pi_status, cate_name, di_price, di_name, si_name, si_email, si_phone, si_seq, si_address, si_img_url, mfi_name, mfi_email, mfi_phone,pii_img_url, pi_price-pi_price*pi_discount_rate/100 as discounted_price, (pi_price-pi_price*pi_discount_rate/100)*pi_point_rate/100 as saving_point from( select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from product_info a left outer join category_info b on a.pi_cate_seq = b.cate_seq )c left outer join delivery_info d on c.pi_delivery_seq = d.di_seq )e left outer join manufacturer_info f on e.pi_mfi_seq = f.mfi_seq )g left outer join product_image_info h on g.pi_seq = h.pii_pi_seq where pii_thumb = true )i left outer join seller_info j on i.pi_seller_seq = j.si_seq where pi_name like #{keyword} order by pi_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select count(*) from product_info where pi_name like #{keyword}
